p: Compounds 135– 146 were evaluated for their inhibitory effects on the NO production in LPS-stimulated RAW264.7 microglial cells using Griess assay. Meanwhile, the effects of compounds 135– 146 on cell proliferation/viability were measured using the MTT method. As a result, compounds 138, 139, 142, 143, 145 and 146 exhibited inhibitory activity against NO production with IC 50 values in the range of 56.3–98.4 μM (IC 50 values of compounds on LPS-stimulated NO production in RAW264.7 macrophage cells 138: 85.2 ± 4.3 µM, 139: 98.4 ± 5.6 µM, 142: 95.9 ± 3.4 µM, 143: 64.8 ± 1.3 µM, 145: 60.0 ± 3.1 µM, 146: 56.3 ± 1.1 µM). Indomethacin was used as a positive control (IC 50 = 33.6 ± 1.4 μM) [ 45].
